Post-Match Reflections: The coach highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their playoff push.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians do not quit, showing that again while overcoming a 6-2 deficit to tie Game 4 in the eighth on David Fryâ€™s infield single that was misplayed by Leiter Jr. and allowed Bo Naylor to score from third.
Even after another unexpected Clase hiccup on Friday -- the All-Star closer allowed two runs in the top of the ninth -- the Guardians mounted a last-gasp rally in the bottom half.

This is not the first time these Guardians have been in this spot this postseason. They also faced elimination in the AL Division Series against the Tigers before prevailing in five games on the heroics of a grand slam by Thomas.
